column4: hi, I'm running jaunty 64 on my laptop. I have an ICH9M sound card, and volume is set at max but no where near as loud as vista. Can anyone help?
I maxed all the output levels, and it did help a little. Vista is still way louder though. Anywhere else I should look?
not really no.. maybe check if there's other users who have the same problem with their soundcard
